section.heading: Collection of taxes by commission -- Administrative charge.

content.p: 59-12-206. Collection of taxes by commission -- Administrative charge. (1) The commission shall transmit the sales and use tax revenues the commission collects in accordance with a contract with any county, city, or town monthly by electronic funds transfer. (2) The commission shall retain and deposit an administrative charge in accordance with Section 59-1-306 from revenues the commission collects from a tax under this part. Amended by Chapter 309 , 2011 General Session
